parameters: (That's what the salamander-skin gloves were for)
Era, would you mind taking this books back to the shelf
on the second-floor? I'll look them through later.
Return the books to the 2nd floor
Ah! I almost forgot! Here's the money for the fireworks.
Decided to take all the colors?
I haven't decided yet what I want.
(This isn't so bad. I just have to run back and forth.)
Now I want a different color...
Excuse me, could you bring me a blue hair dye? I don't want to lose
Era gave the girl the blue dye.
Ummm... You know, I've changed my mind, can you bring me purple? I
don't want my hair to match the color of my robe.
But I didn't ask for this one, I asked for the blue one.
(Why did I take a different color instead of blue dye?)
Era gave the girl the purple dye.
Oh, no, sorry, purple would be too dark. Can I have green?
Era gave the girl the green dye.
I hope you won't change your mind again.
Okay, wait. I will bring you all the colors, and you will
(It's weird that I confuse colors, I hope it's not a
Here, all the dye colors, take your pick. The ones you
won't buy just leave on the counter.
Era gave the girl all the dyes.
(I'll bring her all the colors at once.)
We, common guys, have to resort to the help of magicians.
But I don't mind if I'm getting served by such a cute magician.
Come whenever you want, I can do a lot more than that.
I can't decide what to choose...
I want to find a gift for my fiancee.
Which of these enchanted objects can you recommend to me? What would
Enchanted objects, you say? Let's take a look!
Oh... Choosing a good gift is so difficult...
I think this one would be a good gift for a girl!
Era took the ring, but it slipped from her fingers and rolled under
Era took the item from the shelf and accidentally knocked over a box
The ring fell out and rolled under the shelf.
What kind of ring is it? Can I see it?
Cough-cough! (It's so dusty! How can I find the ring here?!)
Just a moment, the ring rolled far away, hard to reach!
Uh... No, no, I'm not rushing you! You can take as much time as you
(I almost gave myself away! It would be so embarrassing...)
(Does she know she's not wearing underwear?)
(Of course she knows, how can one walk without underwear and not know
(Pity that my fiancee doesn't dress like that...)
(Almost!.. Come on!.. Just a little bit!..)
Yes! This ring is the perfect gift! I'll take it!
(Hehe. Working here is not so bad!)
(I'll just find my underwear first. Because working in
such a short dress, and without underwear...)

I'd like to work for an Alchemist, too!

I'm sure my fiancee will love this gift!
(I probably worry over nothing, it doesn't look like he
(Too bad I didn't take the memory crystal with me. I would have such
(I don't want to carry all the bottles in my hands)
Era handed over the basket of ingredients.
(Definitely not a gift for a girl.)
An additional set of textbooks never hurt anybody.
What a pretty girls work here!
What time will you be free? Why don't we go out and have a drink?
I already have things to do today...
